q: leaders in Congress are serious about introducing legislation that would allow states, for the first time, to enter bankruptcy court. '' he said. ''Larry, Sergey Brin and I have worked exceptionally closely together for over a decade- and we anticipate working together for a long time to come.'' Page praised Eric Schmidt for an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. ''There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, he said. '' Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him. His advice and efforts will be invaluable to me as I start in this new role,'' he said
